## Faithful Work in an Unfaithful System

Modern systems increasingly reward speed, visibility, and compliance over integrity and durability. This essay explores what it means to practice faithful work inside systems that are structurally misaligned with truth, and why sovereignty begins with retaining authorship over oneâ€™s laborâ€”even when that choice comes at a cost.
